Stages: 2. Durability Test (Being hit by a mallet)

Logs.Text: Met with Dr. Nefario. He asked me to test a "Boogie Robot." It danced too hard and exploded. Nefario said my blast resistance was "adequate."

Description: General labor required for villainous plots. Duties include stealing world landmarks, assembling freeze rays without reading instructions, and laughing uncontrollably at the word "bottom." Must be willing to be mutated into a purple monster occasionally. Uniform (denim overalls) provided.
Notes: Boss has a very pointy nose but seems like a dad figure. Benefits include free cloning if I accidentally explode during a mission.
